issue.title: [Packaging] AppVeyor wheel task is failing on initial checkout
issue.body:

### Original Issue Description:
This build is failing and I'm not sure why: https://ci.appveyor.com/project/cpcloud/crossbow/build/1.0.97

I don't think the title issue is the problem, but I did discover this issue in the debugging process.

Looks like using `ARROW_SRC` is the fix for this issue.
